title: We had our maiden net profitable financial year at nearly Rs 100 cr: Oyo founder Ritesh Agarwal
description: Agarwal had shared with employees in February that it has doubled its profit after tax (PAT) sequentially in quarter three of financial year 2024 to Rs 30 crore. The company had marked its maiden profitable quarter with a PAT of over Rs 16 crore in quarter two of fiscal year 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
